entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023
